regen.new_specification: The system shall notify the user with a confirmation message that entered data has been cleared after clicking the Cancel button.

regen.absent_element: situation of data handling when the close button is clicked
regen.new_specification: When the Close button is clicked, the system shall prompt the user to save changes before closing.

regen.absent_element: warning detailing potential data loss when close button is clicked without saving
regen.new_specification: The system shall display a warning detailing the potential data loss if the close button is clicked without saving data.

label: The system shall direct the user to the xxx Page if the user chooses to click the close button without entering any data.
absence: situation of clicking the close button
